overview.title: Technical Communicator
overview.subtitle: UX/Technical Writer | Technical Editor | Content Strategist | User-Advocate
overview.statement: Master of the best practices in technical communication and experienced with structured authoring and the latest documentation technologies, I advocate for smart content that is reusable, searchable, and most of all, user-focused.
overview.goal: My career goal is to continue to benefit business goals by delivering fast, professional content and by advising on content goals, usablity practices, and by providing new creative soultions now made possible by web services and cloud computing.
